STATE
v.

Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender.

Ellen A. Newby, Assistant Attorney General, William R. West, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th of September 2018 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:
